website_summaries.verdict: This is a powerful power bank that can repeatedly charge a device when someone on the go is away from an outlet.
pros: Easy to operate, simply plug in device and begin charging
Charges most phones 6 or more times
Side indicator conveniently displays how much power is left in power bank
When charging a device and it hits 100%, power bank automatically turns off
cons: Watts are too high for this device to be brought in carry on luggage

customer_reviews.title: I bought this battery for a trip to the EU ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery for a trip to the EU to make sure I would have enough battery power for my phone, tablet and my dad's phone. It has worked well. It also "payed" for itself the day/night I got lost. I it kept my phone powered for 26 hours and it did not drop below 60%. For the peace of mind it gave that I did not have to worry about running out of power for my phone that I needed for GPS and Google translate made the money spent on this well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I have had to date.
customer_reviews.text: This charger has power to spare. I use this on our boat, we go out for several days at a time, charging phones, iPads, etc really is a Hugh drain on house batteries. I picked this Imuto 30000mAh charger up mainly for charging things while on the boat. My wife and I charge our phones, iPads, headphones, GPS receiver and friends phones over a four day period and still had 23% let. Plug it in at home and was fully charged to 100% over night, around 10hrs. I used this for 4 months now and have had no issues. Friends have tried two cheaper ones and a solar powered one. They just order this Imuto 30000mAh.
customer_reviews.author: Woz

customer_reviews.title: Charges devices slowly, so does every other battery pack: Product does not meet description
customer_reviews.text: DISCLAIMER: This product takes 20 hours to charge; This product DOES NOT actively quick charge for different devices as advertised- I have a samsung galaxy s9 with appropriate charger and if left plugged in over night takes 4 hours to charge to 50% and then power pack shuts off and does not fully charge phone. This product is simply a battery with an LCD screen that reads its remaining power, nothing more; takes to long to charge it to full power, is much faster to charge devices with any wall outlet or cigarette outlet; not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Bought the supposed new updated one Jan of 2020. Failed to charge up with any charger PD or otherwise. Even failed to charge with the shipped adaptor on many known working chargers! Didn’t even have 30K mAH of power. More as measured like 26K. The item was well made on outside but junk on inside. Shipped back to Amazon luckily within 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Noel S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor charging socket
customer_reviews.text: I found this charging treasure when I moved today. I bought it two years ago. After using it a few times, the charging socket was broken. Because it was bought for my sister, it is not convenient to return it. Today, my sister moved and saw this power bank again. She was very angry and blamed me for wasting money and buying a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY AND GO BUY A BETTER BATTERY PACK
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS. I had the battery pack for a month. After that it took days just to get it back to 100%. I even switch outlets and cables and it still did the same thing. When i would plug my phone or watch to it literally started dying in 45 minutes. And the battery pack would be on zero again. I'm honestly disappointed because I email imuto support to get a replacement since it's still under warranty and they never emailed me back.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long hauls
customer_reviews.text: Took a trip to Spain and France with a group of students, was able to keep everyone nice and juiced up until we were able to get back to the hotel. Never did I have a problem with charge speed or battery life, I was wary of the quality as it was coming from China, but I have to say that iMuto really out did themselves here, not once was it fully drained even when charging 3 phones for 12 hours a day, and never did I wake up to see it under charged when it dropped down below 25%, the charge time is fast, and it is great for trips with multiple people
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing Negative to say about this Monster! lol It came 100% charged...3 USB ports as described very nice looking if there was any con's at all??? And I'm staying nutral on this...It has some pretty good weight to it...but for 30000 mAh I'll deal with it! Very recommended
customer_reviews.author: john zubak

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to charge my phone while camping and run some very small low draw led fairy lights. Even on full charge the battery wouldn't even charge my phone the entire way. Best it would do it keep the phone at what ever % it was at when I plugged it in. Complete junk don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: TRASH TRASH TRASH TRASH
customer_reviews.text: This is the most garbage power bank I have ever used. It does not have fast charging capabilities as described, and not enough capacity to charge my note 10+ to 100%
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: After nearly a decade of junk someone FINALLY did it right!!!
customer_reviews.text: A large capacity with quick charge capability both ways in and out) makes this battery the number one choice for power users. It leaves the others in the dust. If you actually know what quick charge does, nothing more needs to be said, as you will most likely buy this (currently) one of a kind product.
customer_reviews.author: John Public

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware but it charges for a while
customer_reviews.text: My experience with the product has been that it has long dura Uluru as advertised but the material quality is not up to par. The side charge button stopped working almost immediately so you have to plug and unplug your cable anytime you want to charge which is not the case with its competitors. But yes it charges for a long time and has a screen that shows you by number how much charge is left.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 3 charge cycles and quit. Wouldn't charge up. Amazon was awesome though. They refunded my money in full. The charger is junk. Amazon is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT FAST CHARGE S10+
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT Fast Charge ! Yes, it's nice and bulky and I'm sure itll last but I tried all 3 ports with different high speed type speed cables and they all "Charge" and not "Fast Charge" ...unfortunately I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Bad discription
customer_reviews.text: Discription was different then what I got. Was told solar. Not at all. Was told compact. Not one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Venus Hiltner

customer_reviews.title: Power Priced!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be an actual 30.000 mph charger. As opposed to so many fakers out there. It’s a tad heavy but WELL worth the Power security. Takes an inordinate amount of time to charge (strange). After two weeks I’ve noticed that it has begun to take up to 24 hours of charge time to get from 72% to 99.
customer_reviews.author: 2xist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product well thought
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought it it has been very useful, fast and it does cover my necessities on the other side price value is good, I did measure its rate of discharge and my readings do not go up to 30000ma, my apreciation is between 18000 and 20000, still as value for money it is excellent, i only wish they would really rate those products truthfully, It is not the first one i buy, and except the very expensive makes, they always rate lower, as it is said, you get what you pay for, but even at 20000 mah it is still worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Elian

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to work
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, but the quick charge port was finicky at best right out of the box. Charging my galaxy s7, the charger would cycle on and off repeatedly. The regular usb port had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Marron

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Returned
customer_reviews.text: This charger took forever to charge to 100%. One iPhone 7 re-charge which was already at 50% took two hours to charge to 100%. Brought this charger from 100% to 82%! Just to charge half of a cell phone charge. Returned this item. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Battery just stopped charging up after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only owned this charger for 7 months and it no longer will charge. $40 on a fixed income is a lot of money to waste for such a short life. It worked pretty well until this last week when it suddenly stopped being able to charge up for use. I needed this to last longer than less than one year. Try something else
customer_reviews.author: Libellule1963

customer_reviews.title: Completely Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I have had LOTS of portable power banks. Those all started to lose power as soon as they were unplugged. These do NOT. I charged one when I returned from a trip three weeks ago. Today, I checked it, and it was still 100% charged. When I travel, I watch videos continuously to pass the time. This power bank kept my phone and tablet fully charged and it never fell below 60%. It charged my tablet even while I was watching videos. Other chargers required me to quit using the device while it was charging...this did not. I really can't sing its praises loudly enough. I have two, and will be getting a couple more for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all!
customer_reviews.text: Used this only a couple times, was in my bag with my iPad and iPhone charging, when I went to plug it in to charge the battery the connector isn’t lining up to the hole. The Battery is all puffed up, which means the battery failed. So it’s literally useless now. I wanted to contact them to see what my options are but only after 2 months it’s says that I can’t even contact the seller. WHAT IS THIS?
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It broke after almost 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product. I could charge multiple devices at once multiple times before needing to recharge the unit. My complaint lies in that I purchased this on August 29, 2019 and I went to charge it this morning with the charging cable it came with and the charging piece within the unit is displaced, rendering it inoperable. This is disheartening since I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlyn

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT CHARGE MAC BOOKS
customer_reviews.text: Claims it can charge a macbook. Not even close iven been using and chaing my mac book for 2hrs and ive lost 17% battery. Huge bummer. I guess plus side is that if you have 50% battery and connect the powerbank you could get an extra few hours of use if your lucky
customer_reviews.author: IVIBED

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky, but it works well so far...
customer_reviews.text: So far, the product has worked well. I have had it only a few days. However, it is way larger and heavier than expected, so that is the only thing dislike right now, although I plan to keep it, as it was the best deal for the money I found. My picture above is the charger next to the iPhone X. I hope that gives future buyers a goood idea of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging fully about about 1 month of occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: I had to give 1 star for this item because it stopped working properly after about 1 month of use and is now not charging at all. Initially it was great and worked to charge multiple items at a time and multiple times. After about 1 month is would begin shutting itself off and only charge items for a few minutes. Now it is not charging items at all. I have tried using all 3 ports and have tried using different USB tips to see if that was the issue. The only issue however is the charger itself not working. Have reached out to Imuto but no response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kinne

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 45 days!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible purchase. Stopped working after about 45 days—just after the return window was closed!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered this.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very heavy. Can be put in a purse bit it will weigh the purse down. Since most of us woman carry some kind of tote, put it in the tote. I ordered this because of the all the great reviews on this charger. I needed a strong charger that would charge phones and tablets when I go out. Make sure that if you order this, order a micro usb even though it comes with a five inch micro cord if your phone has a micro port. This charger also has 3 regular ports and a micro port. Read the reviews and you will see the rave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E. T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I charged it up, then put it in my backpack. I forgot it was there, then went out camping months later. It surprised me to pull this thing out of my backpack and it was fully charged! A single night charging my phone only brought it down to 90%. It also has a usb-c connector. It's hard to find chargers or any devices that have one. I have an android phone, so that's what I looked for. It also charges quickly. I lucked out on this one. I've bought batteries in the past that were a waste of money. Glad I stumbled on this.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Orchowski

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service A+
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit back on August 2018 as a prime deal. It was great for charging my items on the go and just about a month or 2 ago, it would take forever to charge. I reached out to iMuto's team and explained to them my situation and immediately they reached out to me to fix the problem. Thank you team.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Dead by morning
customer_reviews.text: I had this connected to my iPad which already had a 72% charge on it at 10:30pm. I left it up and running with the screen on all night while connected to the iMuto. The iMuto never charged itself above 99%, and when left overnight while powering my iPad....both were dead by 7am. I'm not sure if this was a valid test, but my expectations were that it would still be up and running when I returned. This Power Bank is built heavy duty and I liked the features except that it did not appear to charge must faster when connected via my qualcomm quick charge adapter. Returning to Amazon for a Anker that uses PD charging instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts. Multiple charges. Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life of this is amazing. It will charge an iphone multiple times and still have enough to charge an ipad pro. I expected that I would be wasting my money buying a less costly item compared to others but I was surprised at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peanuts

customer_reviews.title: After first use, WILL NOT CHARGE!
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review but this battery is worth breaking that cycle. Battery worked through initial charge. Second charge took TWO DAYS. Third charge it wouldn't go past 7%. DO NOT BUY THIS. I love Amazon but this product is a no.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Collins

customer_reviews.title: I hate it. I didn't use them after a month ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes too long to charge and drain so quickly. I hate it. I didn't use them after a month I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Ger Xiong

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Charger
customer_reviews.text: Awesome charger, I bought this because I was going to Disney world back in March and I knew that my phone has very poor battery life so I needed a very good charger. Now I used this charger about 3 times a day at the parks for about 6 days and I charged my phone with this every night and the battery pack lasted me the entire week of continuously charging. I only charged the pack before I had to leave on the plane. So this pack lasts and extremely long time and the percentage on the front really helps you judge how much time you have left
customer_reviews.author: Shreyas

customer_reviews.title: A compact powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from Amazon to add to my Hurricane preparedness kit. Power bank arrived within 24 hours of ordering and arrived with 85% power on the bank. The design is sleek , clean, and provides the viewer with a digital readout of how much power remains. I'm impressed with the technology, and while I haven't powered anything to date, I have no doubt the imuto will be up to the task. In addition to this power bank I look forward to researching and trying some of the other quality power products by imuto.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Betts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery for a Vive wireless user
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life, 6-10 hours play time with the Vive Pro on the wireless adapter Vs the 2 with the original battery. Takes upwards of 25 hours to fully charge and rapid chargers actually take longer so stick to a standard one. Just ordered a second one to overcome the long charge
customer_reviews.author: Corwin

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize what I was actually purchasing. Turns out I received the Binford 2020 model of battery chargers. I has plenty of power to charge multiple electronic devices simultaneously or in sequence. Once the unit is discharged, the recharge time to full capacity is reasonable. The 2 minor negative comments is due the extended power bank, it is a little heavy vs other items on the market, as well as larger in size than the I-phone 7+. considering the depth of power back up brought, it is a fair trade off for me. Highly recommend this product for your backup unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kris S. Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: The 30,000 mAh is overrated
customer_reviews.text: I like how this can charge devices like the Surface pro 7, Dell XPS 13, and iPad Pros at a considerably quick speed. Where it fails, and miserably, is the purported 30,000 mAh rating - I am more inclined to believe that it is a lie. Ideally, with that rating, it should be able to charge any of the devices listed at least on two cycles (with a little more left). However, with just a single charge, it goes down to 0 (and rather quickly once it gets to the 30% mark). Really, this is more like 20,000 mAh, it seems lighter than the other 30,000 mAh charger brand that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG AND HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: I expect batteries for charging laptops to be bigger and heavier than standard portable batteries. But this battery is even BIGGER and HEAVIER than any I've used before. Functionally, it seems fine. But for the reviews saying this is easy to carry in a briefcase or backpack?? I didn't realize sherpas used this website. I would NEVER carry a battery this big and heavy in my bag on a daily basis. I may keep this in my car for emergencies, but I don't consider it practical to carry around daily, it's just too heavy and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: VNovaCat

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient
customer_reviews.text: After the first charging of the charger itself I wouldn't even recharge at 1% an hour! And OMGosh if you're hiking, this is NOT the charger for you as it is heavy & bulky
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not as fast as they claim
customer_reviews.text: Its not 45 watts, thats the only reason i bought it so that my phone could be charged as fast as possible, but it takes almost an hour longer than if I used my 45 watt wall adapter. Idk if its because of the type of current or something but I dont want it. I did that math and this power bank should charge my phone roughly 10 times, but it only does 6 or 7 times. Its good, but its not as good as i was told.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this battery for my dashcam.I would not wanna take a chance using my vehicle battery ,just in case it was left on. This way i unplug the camera and the battery,and take them with me.The digital readout tells how much power is left in the battery and i can say that for a few hours use,it still has never gone below 96%.Well worth the price. I hace an Anker 20'000MAH battery also,but i use that for cellphone, bluetooth speaker,and MP3 player battery backup.That also is a great battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy, but it’s a mighty charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger is a beast. I have an old iPhone that I don’t want to replace, so I purchased this charger to take on a trip. As many people have said, it is heavy and large (larger than my hand). It charged my phone at least ten times before I needed to charge the charger. It was pretty heavy to lug on my trip to New York, and I didn’t really need a charger with so much power. My husband is taking it with him on a week long camping trip, and it is perfect for that use.
customer_reviews.author: Calebmama

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable charger back in august, it is now november and no longer works, it wont charge or hold a charge when i do get it to charge, it was wonderful when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger! Traveled for two weeks and easily charged the iPhone (7plus) about half of those nights. Wanted to store it empty, so continued to use it after I got home to charge the phone from half power every night for an additional 4-5 nights. (The Bose speaker I hooked up to it drained it in one night from 35% to nothing though). No problems with TSA Carrying case keeps it and the cords clean and accessible.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kay

customer_reviews.title: great battery, long life, outlived my cat
customer_reviews.text: This battery can easily take out at least 5 people and put them in the hospital with ease, just carry this thing for a mile, and i guarantee your back will be gone... with the amount of power supply this puppy stores you can recharge your extra supply charger that charges your laptop to charge your phone. Stuck in the middle of the sahara? And got your battery? NO PROBLEM! Just use that bad boy to charge your phone for the amount of time it takes you to figure out this problem : lambda x.(x x) lambda x.(x x)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous O

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my Ultimate Portable Nintendo Switch setup
customer_reviews.text: This was the final piece in making a fully portable Nintendo Switch experience. I bought a portable monitor originally thinking I can just play my switch on that when I am traveling on campus with friends. However the Switch requires at least 39W of power to export video and so I was stuck needing the wall charger at that time to play since my other power banks maxed at 5V and 2.1A. This Power Bank allowed me now to not only power the Switch but my monitor as well making it fully portable with no wall outlets needed. And I was able to play for multiple hours before the battery needed to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Order carefully
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, but I had been bouncing back n forth between a few models, and didn’t realize the one I settled on does not have a USB C port, which isn’t a huge deal, but I kind of wanted to use my usb c to c cable, and I can’t now. Also, I’m not sure the usb3 superspeed lighting bolt logo is placed accurately. Anyone else care to chime in on that? Difference between port without markings and the two “ss” ports?
customer_reviews.author: sneef

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I order this in April 2019 and it started out great but the battery started draining at a faster pace and we would let it recharge once it hit 20-30% but now it’s dead. Last night it was charging my phone and it had 66% and it died at 0% out of no where. I charged it last night and it still at 0%. Going to a different product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sanders

customer_reviews.title: iMuto 30000mAh Portable Charger X6, 3-Port USB Output Power Bank
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have item for travelers. Works great, although I bought 3 other brand power banks with decent reviews that ended up not working really fast before finding this one. It's about the size of an iPhone 10 XS Max but triple the thickness and weight. I use it all the time, (sometimes even at home when I'm not near an outlet). Works great and I get several charges out of my, iPhone 10 XS Max and still have power in the power bank. Plus it has a digital percentage readout, so no guessing when to recharge the power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Priced Right
customer_reviews.text: Excellent portable power source when an emergency boost is needed. I charge my IPhone 10 Max from about 5% to a full charge with approximately 15% of the battery. iPad Pro requires approximately 40% of the battery per charge. Fits nicely in a brief case, however it seems a bit larger than the pictures in the advertisement. About the same dimension of an IPhone 10 Max, but 2 or 3 times as thick. Overall, a very good product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Finder

customer_reviews.title: BEST battery on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Imuto battery I’ve purchased. I bought the 20000 mAh one the first time and loved it. This one is BIGGER in size and heft with 30000 mAh. It has 2 fast charge ports plus a Standard . It charges my iPad 2x what my house wall socket can charge. It takes a while to recharge the battery because the capacity is so high, but it also lasts a long time. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: savvy reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for camping and traveling and it does not disappoint! I have a Galaxy S10+ and this power bank can fully recharge my device at least 3 times. I've never had to recharge it that much, but it can handle it. The product itself takes awhile to fully charge but I believe that's because it has a monster battery with massive compacity. I'm very satisfied with my iMuto!
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Higuera

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Provided much needed power while on tour in china keeping mu laptop, phone and portable wifi running all day on the buses. The only bad was China is screening power banks and electronics heavily and I was pulled out on two flights during the trip having to return back to ticket counters. Then going all the way through both security screens all over again. Its their rules and the language barrier just made it all so much more difficult. Suggest you make ticket counter aware ahead to avoid this on any travels in airports.
customer_reviews.author: jrleen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this charger!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this charger! My husband had the 20000 one and he used it hiking for two weeks on the Appalachian trail. It worked great. He needed up loosing it cause we think we left it at a hotel, not sure. He takes about it all the time and how bummed he was he lost it. Purchased the 30000 one and he was so happy!! It’s a bit bigger and heavier but still an awesome battery!! Worth every penny and durable as hell!!
customer_reviews.author: AISLINN CRAWFORD

customer_reviews.title: Outer casing warped, cant use it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this while it worked. Took it on a trip, and the outer casing warped so that I can't access the ports anymore. Not sure how to contact the manufacturer to fix it, but it's a huge bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Noramaha

customer_reviews.title: I am unable to use the USB-C outlet to charge my phone!
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to use the USB-C outlet to charge my phone! I have never seen a USB-C cord that goes to a USB-C plug and supports Fast Charging. So that makes that port useless to me until I can purchase a USB-C to USB-C Fast Charging extension cord! I have looked at several local electronics stores and they did not carry that type of cable. Also is the USB-C port capable of the Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0? How much faster does it charge? Your included brochures are Not clear. It does seem like a high quality product and so far I am very happy with my purchase! It is a little to heavy to use for Traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Phone Battery Saver
customer_reviews.text: I like how powerful this charger is. I only charge it once and I still have like 20% left after a 10 day trip. You can actually see the battery life left every time you use it so you’re aware when to charge it again. The only thing I don’t like about this charger is that it is too big. Lol I thought it’s like the size of my Iphone X but when I got it, I was so shocked how big and how heavy it is however, I still recommend this to all people who loves to travel and use their phone a lot for taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Mae Brock

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a European trip. My son is Autistic and requires his electronics to remain calm and happy during transitions. We had about 15 hours in transit between airport layovers each way. This device kept ALL our electronics (my mobile, his ipad, 2 kindles, 2 laptops) charged. IT does take awhile to charge the device itself, but after 15 hours with our devices, we still never saw the battery charge drop before 50%. It was very reliable and helped when we had long days of sightseeing and wanted to make sure camera, kindles, mobiles, and ipads had enough charge.
customer_reviews.author: D.M. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Powerful charger. I use a baker 5000mah fast charger to charge the iMuto. It fully chargers over night. I can completely charge my iPad with the iMuto with a little charge left over. The batter pack is heavy but it’s a heavy duty unit so to be expected. Overall very pleased with the purchased! The anker I have charges my phone once and is dead. It’s only a 5000mah but still that seems weak to me. The anker cost $90!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It wasn’t the greatest when we used our backpack and connected it to ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t the greatest when we used our backpack and connected it to the charger. After one hour, the charge was still at 50% from 2%. It could be the bag’s fault because in a way, it’s a muddle man. Charge it directly to the phone and was faster but I did notice that my phone was getting a bit hot. I never had my phone go warm or hot when I charge it on the outlet, is that normal? First time recharging it. It literally takes all day. It's been charging for 12 hours and it's only at 72%. At full charge it was able to charge my iPhone 5x, my husband's Samsung galaxy 5 and my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: arriazac

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write bad reviews. This might be the first one. I had this power bank for two months or more. It used to get charged in 10-12 hours in first couple weeks. Now it takes 30 hours at least. Before I bought this, I’ve seen reviews say: ‘It’s very big’. I didn’t care about it in the beginning. Now I’m regret. It’s really big. It charges my iPhone XS Max 4-5 times. Then charging powerbank is painful. Anyway these are my experiences with it. I’m still using it because I paid for it. But I don’t recommend this product to anyone. There are better ones out.
customer_reviews.author: Sefa Kirici

customer_reviews.title: Great for festivals, hurricane season & on-the-go everyday life!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a festival and had more than enough battery to charge my iPhone all 3 days plus let a few friends charge their devices. It takes a good day to charge fully but it’s become a staple on long drives/flights for the kiddo’s electronics. This would be insanely handy for storm season when power is knocked out as well. It charges VERY quickly when using the quick charge port and I love that I can plug my MacBook straight into the pack with it using the USB-C or whatever it’s called lol Highly recommend this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Danger
customer_reviews.text: Damn I was so happy after reading the reviews I thought I finally got a power bank that would do as promised. I am a disabled veteran and cannot get around without help so I get picked up and dropped off at the Veterans Administration but they take forever to see you so I need power with me for the long hours. I plug it in and a burning wire/plastic/rubber smell comes out of it. Terrible. I guess I'm screwed and didn't even get 5 minutes of charge out of it. Not sure if this comes from China but extremely disappointed in the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: matthew laforest

customer_reviews.title: Just keeps going and going...well you get the point... well until the power check button breaks
customer_reviews.text: I am yet to fully discharge the unit. It just keeps on going and going. I will say that I have dropped it out of my pocket and no damage. This is not for someone that wants to wear skinny jeans and not carry it in something else. It is large and heavy. I carry it everyday in my cargo pockets and I hardly know it is there anymore. But it will not let you down. Now if I could find a faster way to charge it, it would be fantastic. Update: the power check button has failed. Seems to still be usable but you can’t check how much power is left.
customer_reviews.author: The Miser

customer_reviews.title: Bought for use with vive wireless
customer_reviews.text: Ive seen nobody buy this product for my specific use case. I bought it for use with a vive wireless adapter. Continuous usage will give me 7 and a half hours on full charge. Speaking of charge, the first charge will not last to the capacity on the display, but subsequent charges will. Other than that these take forever to charge, so i would recommend a qc 3.0 capable charger to charge these. Due to the charge time, i ended up purchasing a second unit for more consistent playtimes. Also the unit does not come with any charge block
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery
customer_reviews.text: The charger definitely served its purpose. Me and my husband was at a convention and with both of our phones (Galaxy s7 edge, Samsung note 8) charging on the portable charger; it was charging fast and kept our batteries alive once they started to get low at around 6pm. We weren't out long enough to see how long it takes to reach full charge but with both of our phones taking power from it it only went down 20% but our phones went up about 35% so that's pretty good. I cant wait to use it again to really test the limits of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Na'ara

customer_reviews.title: It’s big and heavyyyy, but it charges things like it says
customer_reviews.text: My goodness this thing is HEAVYYY. Although, after I initially charged it, I haven’t needed to really charge it again in a few weeks. I don’t know why I thought this would be lighter or on par with my 10k ma charger I usually carry in my purse. It’s like carrying a brick in my backpack too. But it works! Haha the other stuff is my own bad for not reading the weight or size. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Laura Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Powwweeerrrrr
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a brick. Seriously, its almost as heavy as one...and I'm not complaining about that. It's heavy duty battery power at its best. I wasnt expecting the size, the weight, or the power! It's awesome! I charge it up, toss it in my work bag, and its good to go! 3 USB outlets, 2 of them speed charge capable...it's got it all. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: N.C.H

customer_reviews.title: Can't always charge while devices are plugged in, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this so I could charge my devices while also charing the battery. This works depending on which port you are using to charge the battery itself. I forget what exact combos work/don't but I think the only way you can charge the battery while charging devices is if the battery is plugged into Micro USB. If you charge via USB C the other ports stop working. This was not clearly advertised. Otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Did I get a lemon?
customer_reviews.text: What a struggle I had with this battery bank. Short version? At first, couldn't get it to charge above 81%. Took cycling it to 0% twice for it to finally take 100%. Final straw was slow charging. The way around that would be type C USB with PD, according to the product description. But I couldn't get it to recognize any of my PD charges. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: pablobulldog

customer_reviews.title: Great battery capacity and build quality to last
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beastly. I'm not surprised that it is currently unavailable as of this review. Great value. My current phone, One Plus 3T, has way too many things running at a time and the battery dies fast but I managed to do delivery on a bicycle for 12 hours (there was a good amount of downtime but still i was using my phone) and the battery still didn't get below 20%. It's a brick though so I keep it in my bag and have a long enough USB-C cable to feed my phone power while riding around the city.
customer_reviews.author: SteamRolan

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: .....purchased a charger that works quickly and consistently. This is the only charger I use anymore. Has saved me on many occasions when power was low on iPhone or iPad. It is well built and the LED meter is useful in judging how much charge is left. Connections, charging cord, are excellent. exceptional build quality. My go-to brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Slade

customer_reviews.title: Great life
customer_reviews.text: a little heavy and bulky for a pocket but great in a bag. Takes a long time to charge up but once it is you have power for days. I use it as an emergency pack in my work bag and it is a life saver. Didn't think I needed it, but sure glad I have it now.
customer_reviews.author: Product Owner/Seller

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have flown with this about 4 times now. It does a good job charging. But the main reason it got the three stars is because I don’t even know what the display says. It worked for the first flight then I just had to keep track of how many times I have charged with it. Update: 6-7. I muto has some top notch costumer service. I had a replacement. Within the same week of contact. Like I said it’s worked just fine and is a great charger. Just had to be a little more aware of how many charges I was at without the display. It was replaced no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Joel t Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Self Discharge Rate
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly w/no issues. It charged my iPhone 6S from 1% to 100% in 2 hours 34 minutes. Might be a little longer for others as my battery Maximum Capacity right now is 93% from age and way too many Podcasts! The charger display showed 92% charge left. The charger feels milspec and I would recommend this to anybody. I mean come on 30,000 mAh!
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: First day- months later
customer_reviews.text: Just got my portable charger! And it charged my sprint Samsung galaxy s7 edge just as fast as the wall charger! First day with it and I'm impressed! I'll will update later on. So now its been months since I've had my imuto battery and let me just say. That. This. Thing. Is. A. Monster. No ands or buts about it. Definitely worth every penny, i find it quite hilarious how this portable charger charges my Samsung galaxy s7 edge faster than the wall outlet. Truly stunning product, I thoroughly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: It's dead after 2 months.  Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I own two 20000mah batteries from RavPower, but neither one had a quick charge port, so I decided to buy the iMuto 30000mah battery. In the past two months, I've used it three times. Now, it's dead. The display port which shows the percentage of remaining battery life had gone dark. So, I thought maybe it was just the display that had broken. But then, I used my USB meter to see if the battery was still capable of charging other devices, it was not. The USB meter showed no signs of life from the iMuto. This is a very poor product. You should look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: product failed after six months, I now use it as a paper weights under my fan next to my night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Gravy

customer_reviews.title: Super charger.... DEAD!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE....so gave this a really good review at first because it was a great charger. Holds charge and charges devices very quickly....however,, after 1.5 year of use the unit itself stopped recharging, drop rating to 1 Original review: This charger is a monster of a charger. It lives up to the hip and the description. It charged 3 phones (S8 edge, iphone 7+, 8+) with 80% life for 1hr used up 20%. This chargr is a beast. CAUTION!!! International airports will not allow battery chargers to be checked in, must be carried on. Many airport sec chkpts will not allow this charger to be carried on without registering first.
customer_reviews.author: Gniava

customer_reviews.title: Great job!
customer_reviews.text: Received 88% charged. Tried to fully charge it but will not charge to 100%. Emailed seller and told by Imuto support to fully discharge it. Will not charge at all. Now I’m stuck with a brick and I’m 3 days away from a camping trip with no electric outlets! The Imuto support responded very quickly and replaced the item with a brand new functioning charger. I was very impressed with the swiftness on how they resolved my complaint. This is how every company should react to a dissatisfied customer. Things happen even when you try to do your best but there is always a solution and Imuto Support was on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Redy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger overall, very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item before going to the Kentucky Derby, knowing our phone batteries would not make it all day. This product is a little on the heavy side but overall it has worked as promised. I love that it has 3 ports so anyone I am with can plug in and charge up. We have used it several other times. The first time I used it multiple times to see how many charges I would get. I ended up getting 3 solid charges from this charger and it charges pretty quick. Love that it has a carrying bag that I can put the charging cable in as well as the phone when it's being charged.
customer_reviews.author: akauffsx5

customer_reviews.title: Best battery pack on the market for its price. A must have for travelers.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best portable power bank and is actually very very close to 30000 milliamp hours. While there is no support for the fast charge, it definitely does not detract from the awesomeness of this thing. After charging my note 10 plus from 32 percent and the battery pack at 100 percent, the result was a drop of 11 percent batter life. Can power most portable computer monitors with ease and does so for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: chad k. lepine

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: CONS: It's a little large & heavy to carry in your hand. USB2 should have been adaptive fast charging. PROS: Inputs are micro-USB and USB-C to charge the batteries. Capacity is 30000mAh. Outputs are: USB1 for fast adaptive, USB2 for 2.4A normal fast, and (the same) USB-C. It seems you can use all the inputs at the same time as the outputs except USB-C because it's just one port.
customer_reviews.author: Daygone(dot)com

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my granddaughter who when she calls home always seems to have only 1 or 2 percent charge on her phone .... I wanted a charger that would hold up and this fit the bill .... she was able to charge her phone at least 4 times before needing to recharge the battery !!!!!! Great product for my needs .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Charging the charger is painful- but does an awesome Kobe charging the phone once’s it’s charged!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this charger! Charges my hone super fast! And several times a day. I’ve purchased 3 so far. One for a gift and 2 for myself. Unfortunately, the charging process of the charger is painful. I have to wrap the charging wire around the box and balance something on top of it just charge the charger. Usually I leave it charging overnight or all day and I end up disappointed to see that it hasn’t been charging all day. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fully charge and starts losing charge plugged in and without use
customer_reviews.text: Came charged 74%. Charged for 4 days and it went to 75% - never more. Left charging and after 6 days it went DOWN to 51%. Unless I am doing something wrong - not worth it. Purchased for backup when power goes out. Absolutely Useless if it cannot hold a charge when plugged in and not being used at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine State

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it twice so far. It is a bit heavy yet l put it in my jeans back bucket when l go day hiking & overnight. That’s what l got it for. Thought about a solar yet chose this. It charged my cell twice & iPad ones taking it down to 50%. So it’s on course for what they say. It’s not a fast charger, say normal. It does take about 3 hours to charge back up to 100% after 50% usage. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: AndoD

customer_reviews.title: A lot of portable power in a small amount of space
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this charging brick for a recent trip to Europe. Very pleased with this product! The Airbus we were flying on had USB chargers in the seat, but for some reason it would not charge our iPad Air. I used the iMuto and was able to recharge the iPad completely. Some reviews also mention the device being very heavy, but I had it in a carry on backpack and didn't notice it. It is quite small for the amount of power it packs. If you are looking for a decent amount of portable power, you can't go wrong here! I used this to charge an iPad Air, a Nintendo Switch and multiple phones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Over all I love this charger and would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my S7 edge. Let me mention few things for others who is looking yo buy this one: 1- don't forget u burying 30000mAh charger so it's kinda bulky. 2- this would charge my phone fully maybe 4 or 5 times. 3-this is 3.4amp output so it would charge my phone really fast. 4- charging this unit takes long time due to the size so it's not really problem that's why I do it over night. Over all I love this charger and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam bee

customer_reviews.title: Did barely last a year
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended... It worked fine at first but after a while it did not properly charge because somehow the connection of the USB-charging-Port became bad. You would have to wiggle the cable in a certain way to make it charge, and if anything moves for a millimeter (if even) it would just stop charging. And there is no fast-charging-anything! It takes FOREVER to charge this thing. Even before the fault with the cable. Now it's basically useless because I don't usually have 3-4 days just to charge this piece of crap... Will now buy from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Higher Capacity Battery + Digital Readout
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a travel battery backup with the capacity and digital readout similar to the one I previously bought, but was now unavailable through Amazon. Although this one was a different design and by a different manufacturer, it had both the matching high capacity + digital readout letting you know its reserve power. I would highly recommend this unit over the myriad of others offered on Amazon given these features.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Porter

customer_reviews.title: Literally A Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This product was highly recommended on multiple sites. I have a lot of devices I charge. I had three days without power last year. This thing kept my insulin pump and cellphones charged. Having a digital display telling you available charge was also extremely helpful. I can't recommend this brick enough. Seeing as how I would die without insulin and my pump remained fully charged I can semi say this saved my life.
customer_reviews.author: Underdog Rising

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable charger in January. Today is April 13th. For the past two weeks when I have tried to charge it it says 00 on the display, indicating no battery remaining. Without being able to charge, the battery is useless! I would definitely return it but the window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: majesticgoldenrose

customer_reviews.title: Stops working within 2 months. Not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 3 of these over a period of time. The first I had for several years with no issues before it died. My second one stopped working within 2 months. The 3rd lasted only 1 month, then stopped working right after the return window ended.
customer_reviews.author: SilentBiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this bulky and slow charging product.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this unit. It does not hold a charge as well as my other power banks from Anker and LimeFuel, it charges horribly slow and is so large and cumbersome as to be almost worthless. It also does not seem to charge up to the rated battery rating. I get more charge out of my 23500mAh Anker than I do with this 30000mAh power bank. It also takes 4X as long to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Battery. Lifesafer after the recent Tropical Storm
customer_reviews.text: Love the mini indicator screen with a percentage to charge. The triple port is very handy. We charged everything from cell phones, ipads, tablets, switch, laptop, etc. It does take a while to charge which is understandable seeing its 30,000 mah.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Please help or at least read before buying
customer_reviews.text: I thought I bought the version with a USB c cable for my Nintendo Switch which costed a little more but when I opened the package and tried to plug the switch in I realized that it didn't fit and the cord in fact wasn't a c type USB cable. Did this happen to any one else or did I receive the wrong cable
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Benton

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both authors and we do our illustrations in Procreate on our iPad pro's for hours at a time. We use these battery chargers to charge while drawing without interruption . This is a great thing because charging it to any other power source causes our Procreate app to act up and does not allow us to draw while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jay Ewington

product_meta.title: iMuto Portable Charger 30000mAh, Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 and USB-C Type-C Ports Power Bank External Battery Pack for Samsung Galaxy S10/S9, iPhone 11/X/8/7/6/Plus, iPad, Nintendo Switch and More
feature_bullets: First Portable Charger with Qualcomm Certified Quick Charge 3.0 Technology: Up to 4x faster than standard chargers, it is capable of charging up to 80% of the battery for QC 2.0 / 3.0 compatible devices. Note: It is not pocket-size due to its’ high capacity

Type-C/ USB-C Input & Output: Up to 3A input and output with Type-C/ USB-C port, it can quickly charge your devices with Type-C port and recharge the 30000mAh external battery quickly. (Please ensure it is in sleeping mode when you use X6L Pro to charge MacBook Which with USB-C port. Otherwise, the battery pack will not be powerful enough to charge it.)

Ultra-High Capacity: iMuto X6L Pro 30000mAh is the highest capacity portable charger with QC 3.0 and Type-C port. The 30000mAh power bank guaranteed with build-in A-Class Lithium polymer batteries is safer to use. Enough capacity to charge 2016 MacBook 2.5 times, iPhone 7 almost 12 times, Galaxy S7 almost 7 times and iPad Air almost 2.5 times. For Nintendo Switch, PLEASE BUY IMUTO USB TO TYPE-C CABLE OR TYPE-C TO TYPE-C CABLE SEPARATELY and it can be compatible after the system upgrades.

Digi-Power and iM-Power Technology: Smart digital screen shows remaining power in digital format, and it's hidden until activated. All USB ports detect your device intelligently and deliver the faster charging. X6L Pro fits for almost all USB-powered devices. Note: It may not support devices with small currents under 1A, like some bluetooth headsets, smartwatches and so on.

Multiple Smart Protection System: keeps your devices safe from over-charging, over-voltage, over-current and short circuit. What You Get: X6 Pro External Battery Pack, Micro USB cable, Travel waterproof pouch, User guide, our 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,217 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
